seo.title: Getting to Manarola 2025 | Train, Car & Travel Guide
seo.description: Complete guide to reaching Manarola. Train connections, parking options, and transportation tips for Cinque Terre's most iconic village.

body.title: Getting Here
body.subtitle: Manarola is car-free and best reached by train. Learn about train schedules, parking, and alternative transportation options.

features.title: By Train (Recommended)
features.description: Frequent trains from La Spezia (8 min) and Levanto. Station is in the village center.

features.title: Parking Areas
features.description: Park at Volastra (1.5km uphill) or La Spezia. No cars allowed in village itself.

features.title: Bus from Parking
features.description: Shuttle buses connect Volastra parking to the village. Runs frequently in season.

features.title: Ferry Service
features.description: Seasonal boat service from La Spezia, Portovenere, and Levanto to Manarola harbor.

features.title: Hiking In
features.description: Walk from neighboring villages via coastal trails. Via dell'Amore from Riomaggiore.

features.title: Cinque Terre Card
features.description: Includes unlimited trains between villages, trails, and buses. Essential for visitors.
